name: Lawful good
desc: Creatures can be counted on to do the right thing as expected by society.
common: Gold dragons, paladins, and most dwarves are lawful good.

name: Neutral good
desc: Folk do the best they can to hep others according to their needs.
common: Many celestials, some cloud giants, and most gnomes are neutral good.

name: Chaotic good
desc: Creatures act as their conscience directs, with little regard for what others expect.
common: Copper dragons, many elves, and unicorns are chaotic good.

name: Lawful neutral
desc: Individuals act in accordance with law, tradition or personal codes.
common: Many monks and some wizards are lawful neutral.

name: Neutral
desc: For those who prefer to steer clear of moral questions and dont take sides, doing what seems best at the time.
common: Lizardfold, most druids, and many humans are neutral.

name: Chaotic neutral
desc: Creatures follow their whims, holding their personal freedom above all else.
common: Many barbarians and rogues, and some bards, are chaotic neutral.

name: Lawful evil
desc: Creatues methodically take what they want, within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order.
common: Devils, blue dragons, and hobgoblins are lawful evil.

name: Neutral evil
desc: For those who do whatever they can get away with, without compassion or qualms.
common: Many drow, some cloud giants, and yugoloths are neutral evil.

name: Chaotic evil
desc: Creatures act with arbitrary violence, spurred by their greed, hatred, or bloodlust.
common: Demons, red dragons and orcs are Chaotic evil.
